i use beepbox, which is a website for making music.
it stores all song data in its url, so might as well
store them in the repository since it's free and easy
to access.
	- pkhead

Sound effects:
	https://box.slrmoo.com/website/#s5N06Soundsn910s0k02l0ee01t50a2g0fj07r3O__cgRM5n21gbm71QTeQ8P80FL7VCDFL7yRo5xA08p3xw54ng74Rc82Rl6Bjds2Cab3yg50LMsRW17y50M43p8Mar7F5EUc1jefMk0

the music:
